トピック.授業外学習2: This is an all-English classroom. You greatly enhance your acquisition of English by using it as much as possible. In addition, using Japanese limits your classmates’ learning opportunities. Please encourage each other to use English. You could lose participation points if you use Japanese in class or outside of class in online situations.
